title: Naughty or Nice
description: A system to track and organize the naughty and nice deed children have done.

title: Merry Munch-o-Meter
description: A cookie counter to help Santa track his cookie intake and display his current mood (based on cookies consumed).

title: Jingle Bell Balancer
description: Creating a Sleigh Load Balancer: a system that lets Santa balance out his sleigh load to minimize the trips needed.

title: Heart of Christmas
description: A heart rate monitor for Santa, constantly gathering his current heart rate from an API and display the information to the elves.

title: Present Progress
description: A dashboard that displays information on each elf and their productivity.

title: Mistletoe Metronome
description: A BPM counter that helps elfs tap along to their favorite songs.

title: Morse Mischief
description: A morse code translator to help Santa communicate over long distance with his top reindeer trainer.

title: Santa's Final Countdown
description: A festive countdown timer to midnight on Christmas Eve

title: Pop-up! Spreading the holiday cheer
description: A pop up message from Santa wishing holiday cheer.

title: Tinsel Transformers
description: Enter your human name and get your Elf name in return!

title: Greetings and salutations
description: An interactive canvas for building christmas cards with stickers!
